Name: Perla di Roma
Review Text: This was genuinely amazing Italian food... Absolutely tasty and very good portions.. The bread they served was also hot. You wait a bit for the food but its fresh, and incredibly tasty.. Well worth the wait.. Would highly recommend and definitely go there again.

Name: Perla di Roma
Review Text: The garlic bread is to die for. The restaurant is so good, we had to go back again

Name: Perla di Roma
Review Text: Terrible delivery service. Pizza arrived almost 2 hrs after ordering. Was quite rubbery. Was very dissatisfied.

Name: Perla di Roma
Review Text: The food has a good quality and a good portion,  well dosed. It is pretty full, it is recommended to book a table first. The environment was pretty romantic and cozy. I put 4 stars because we had to wait for our dishes for over an hour... the food was worth it, but I will not wait this long again.

Name: Perla di Roma
Review Text:
Good italian place. Decent prices and big plates.
There's no parking for cars. When we went, we stayed outside and there was only one waiter. It took a big longer for the food to came.

Name: Perla di Roma
Review Text: Nice, calm neighborhood atmosphere. Food is made with care. Pizza, pasta and main courses were tasty. Cinnamon icecream with apple pie for dessert, yumm!

Name: Perla di Roma
Review Text: Ordered food to be delivered at home. It arrived promptly and was delicious! The staff were friendly. Excellent!

Name: Perla di Roma
Review Text: Service was a bit slow, but the food was outstanding. Wine & beer choices very limited. Overall we enjoyed our dinner and the setting of this quaint restaurant.

Name: Perla di Roma
Review Text: terrible experience! service wasn't great but the worst was the food!!! not tasty at all (starters, pizza, pasta...) it was tasteless and boring. I truly doubt there were any Italian in the kitchen. worst Italian restaurant EVER!!
